intro.title: CONFINED SINCE WHEN ?
intro.subtitle: For COVID19
intro.text:
The world is currently experiencing a global pandemic : COVID-19 disease, caused by Coronavirus. To stop the spread of the virus, many countries have set up containment of all their inhabitants.
This site presents a non-exhaustive list of these countries and the length of time since containment has been implemented in them.

site_data_message: The data on this site is updated manually and does not guarantee to be exact. It's based on news from around the world.
